items.title: “Il lavoro analitico dell’Agenzia Internazionale dell’Energia – (\*) – è di grande supporto per orientarsi nell’incertezza, individuare priorità strategiche e assumere decisioni informate”

"Arzachena is the municipality of the Costa Smeralda, which, with its administration and its people, wishes to commemorate Prince Karim, an honorary citizen of this town, a man who regarded our territory with love and foresight in his entrepreneurial projects," "When the Monti di Mola area was still a rugged expanse of granite and Mediterranean scrub, the Aga Khan understood that the beauty of the natural heritage, the local culture, and the unique landscape would become the foundation for building his dream, but also for creating a new dream for the people of Arzachena and the Sardinians themselves: he would create not only a top-notch tourist destination, but also a development model based on respect for the environment and local identity that the entire world envies us today"

“Chiedo nella mozione – (\*) – di ripristinare i vecchi importi tariffari, fatti salvi gli adeguamenti Istat, non mi illudo che possa essere fatto domani mattina, ma siccome il Comune intende tornare alla gestione diretta degli spazi blu, chiedo che quando si arriverà a quella situazione si introducano le vecchie tariffe”
